article_title: Number of homeless students rises in Wake County schools
article_text:
Saying goodbye to Brooks

NC legislators discuss pros and cons of proposed tuition cut bill

Valedictorian will be sad to see current honor system eliminated

Women's Leadership Academy valedictorian proud of first graduating class

New process for boarding Wake school buses explained

02:39

article_metadata.news-keywords: wake, county, school, homeless, mckinney-vento, homelessness, students, PLM, Salvation, Army, Project, Catch, Haven, House
article_metadata.description: Thousands of Wake County students go to school each day and then return home uncertain about where they’ll be sleeping – that night or for the next few nights.
article_metadata.title: Number of homeless students rises in Wake County schools | News & Observer
